Protocols/MUTopBarDelegate.html#/c:@M@Se.name: didTap(_:)
Protocols/MUTopBarDelegate.html#/c:@M@Se.abstract: Will trigger each time left button or title is tapped.

Protocols/MUTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: didSelect(_:)
Protocols/MUTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Will trigger each time textfield is selected.

Protocols/MUTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: didReturn(_:)
Protocols/MUTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Will trigger each time textfield loose focus.

Protocols/MUTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: editingChanged(_:)
Protocols/MUTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Will trigger each time textfield is modifying the text.

Protocols/MUPageControlDelegate.html#/c:.name: didTap(_:at:)
Protocols/MUPageControlDelegate.html#/c:.abstract: Will trigger each time the page control is tapped.

Protocols/MUNavigationBarDelegate.html#/.name: leftDidTap(_:)
Protocols/MUNavigationBarDelegate.html#/.abstract: Will trigger on cancel / back button tap.

Protocols/MUNavigationBarDelegate.html#/.name: rightDidTap(_:)
Protocols/MUNavigationBarDelegate.html#/.abstract: Will trigger on main / validate button tap.

Protocols/MUHorizontalPagerDelegate.html.name: didScroll(_:to:)
Protocols/MUHorizontalPagerDelegate.html.abstract: Will trigger each time the page index change.

Protocols/MUButtonDelegate.html#/c:@M@Se.name: didTap(_:)
Protocols/MUButtonDelegate.html#/c:@M@Se.abstract: Will trigger each time button is tapped.

Protocols/MUAvatarDelegate.html#/c:@M@Se.name: didTap(_:)
Protocols/MUAvatarDelegate.html#/c:@M@Se.abstract: Will trigger each time avatar is tapped.

Classes/MUAvatar.html.name: MUAvatar
Classes/MUAvatar.html.abstract: Class that act like UIButton with more customizable options.

Classes/MUButton.html.name: MUButton
Classes/MUButton.html.abstract: Class that act like UIButton with more customizable options.

Classes/MUNibView.html.name: MUNibView
Classes/MUNibView.html.abstract: An object that manages the content for a rectangular area on the screen from a xib file.

Classes/MUWeakProxy.html.name: MUWeakProxy
Classes/MUWeakProxy.html.abstract: A class that create a weak target to avoid retain cycles.

Classes/MUHeader.html.name: MUHeader
Classes/MUHeader.html.abstract: Class that define a title and a detail description.

Classes/MUHorizontalPager.html.name: MUHorizontalPager
Classes/MUHorizontalPager.html.abstract: Class that act like UIScrollView + isPagingEnabled with more customizable options.

Classes/MUNavigationBar.html.name: MUNavigationBar
Classes/MUNavigationBar.html.abstract: Class that act like UINavigationBar with more customizable options.

Classes/MUPageControl.html.name: MUPageControl
Classes/MUPageControl.html.abstract: Class that act like UIPageControl with more customizable options.

Classes/MUTextField.html.name: MUTextField
Classes/MUTextField.html.abstract: Class that act like UITextField with more customizable options.

Classes/MUTopBar.html.name: MUTopBar
Classes/MUTopBar.html.abstract: Class that define a title and a button on left side.
